features: HEAL + SOOTHE: Cica (aka. Centella Asiatica) helps soothe and rebuild the skin barrier, making it stronger.
QUENCH +SMOOTH: Hydrate skin with our lightweight hydrating formula made with moisturizing hyaluronic acid and vegan collagen. Plant collagen helps smooth fine lines to keep it looking youthful.
DAILY MOISTURIZER: Simple and clean formula made into a cooling gel for convenient daily use. Korean herbal beauty secrets for smooth, baby like skin.

K-BEAUTY for all skin types and ages: gentle on rosacea, sensitive, irritated, and damaged skin, the cica gel moisturizer is compatible with all skin types but works even better on oily, combination skin. Korean Skin Care made by top cosmetic manufacturers in Korea.

CERTIFIED VEGAN + Cruelty Free: Customer satisfaction guarantee. Free of parabens, sulphates, phthalates, and animal cruelty. 100% money back if you are not satisfied with your purchase. Feel free to contact us anytime.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cica Gel Moisturizer Cica Redness Solution Cream Cica Cleansing Water Pads Cica & Vitamin C Serum Cica Cream Key Ingredients Cica (Centella Asiatica), hyaluronic acid, vegan collagen Cica (Centella Asiatica), Chaga Mushroom, Lotus Flower, Caviar Lime Cica (Centella Asiatica), blue agave, panthenol, lavender Cica (Centella Asiatica), 3-o-ethyl-l-ascorbic acid, ascorbic acid, green tea, adenosine, panthenol, niacinamide Cica (Centella Asiatica), hyaluronic acid, retinol, dioscorea japonica root, peptide 8 complex Key Benefits Hydrates and locks in moisture Provides a natural looking coverage while helping solve redness longer term Cleanses makeup, dirt, excess oils and mattifies oily skin while soothing irritations Boosts radiance while minimizing irritation with cica Creates a moisture barrier to protect and replenish dry skin When to Use After the cica & vitamin c serum or your favorite serum Smooth over clean, moisturized skin, blending gently as needed Whenever you want to cleanse skin. Make sure to moisturize afterward! After cleansing and toning skin, best used at night. SPF use is advised for daytime use After the cica & vitamin c serum or your favorite serum Free of Parabens and Sulphates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I waited till I completely finished my first purchase to write an honest review. As someone who has extremely oily and acne prone skin, moisturizing is a MUST. I use this product as a night cream, it applies as a cool gel moisturizer, as you spread it, it kinda melts into your skin! (It’s kind of a Lux experience haha) It has a slight fragrance, but it’s almost so light you can’t rlly smell it. If I’m not mistaken, cica is good for redness and inflammation… anytime I use it, I see a pretty decent reduction of redness. Im also a huge fan of the glass skin look it gives off!!! It hasn’t caused me to break out, but ik everyone’s skin type is different. I genuinely love it and now it’s a product I use everyday!!! 🫶🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glossier and younger skin effect!
reviews.reviewText: Really love this line. I have 2 other products that are from Meebak and I have seen results. Lightweight, dries fast but leaving your skin with a glassy look and moisturizing. I only apply this at night and results are way better than my previews product that cost me a fortune. Smells fresh too and I love the coolness it leaves my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this after seeing an ad because the price was reasonable and I am SO glad I did! This stuff is INCREDIBLE!!! It delivers so much hydration and my facial skin is so soft! I’ve been using it about a week now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used their other products before, and I bought this new product for the first time and I love it! Very moisturizing and skin feels great over night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have rarely used facial moisturizers in the past, because I have always had very clear and healthy skin, and didn’t really see the point. But after moving to different climates I started noticing my skin a little drier than normal, so I bought this one on sale and it has been an amazing product! It is gentle on my sensitive skin and softly moisturizing, it makes my skin feel soft and clean and it’s a great texture. The best adjective I can come up with for this product is refreshing. The packaging is also a great texture and weight and one of my favorite colors so I love having it out on my sink, and I use it almost daily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's not too creamy and not too watery
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the meebak cica cream over the last one year. In general, compared to other products, it's cheaper and good quality.With the summer approaching, my skin is getting too dry, so I was looking for something lighter , hydrated, and gel type, once I used it every morning and night for a week straight, the dryness started to fade away, and my skin started to look brighter. I immediately noticed the dry skin was now looking moisturized.It’s a perfect bouncy gel that’s not too creamy and not too watery. It gets absorbed immediately and firms up the skin. I’m so pleased to find out a perfect daily gel for my dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyday Light Moisturizer - Very Good for Value and Perfect Texture
reviews.reviewText: I've explored many water-based moisturizers, but Cica stands out as the best. While alternatives like Belief feel too expensive and watery, Cica delivers on its promise of being genuinely water-based without compromising texture. What I appreciate most is the subtle and light fragrance, reminiscent of Neroli or Bergamot. It's not just refreshing on the skin but also effective in calming redness. If you're looking for quality without breaking the bank, this is the one to go for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for about 2 months now and I am obsessed! It dries fast so you don't have to worry about leftover sticky feeling. My skin feels soft and clear!
